feed.title: Kostos Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Kostos: v1.0.0
entry.content:
Kostos v1.0.0

This is the first 'stable' release of the project. As of now, most bugs that we found by daily usage have been solved, and all features that we wished for are implemented.

Future releases will focus mainly on bug fixes and minor enhancements. Feel free to open an issue or PR.

entry.title: New release for Kostos: v1.0.1
entry.content:
v1.0.1 - Bugfix

  • This release fixes a bug that prevented users form selecting other users in the expense form in the 'Paid by' field.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/shynewt/kostos/compare/v1.0.0...v1.0.1

entry.title: New release for Kostos: v1.0.2
entry.content:
v1.0.2 - Bug Fix

  • Fixes #2
  • Makes use of drizzle migrations
  • Simplifies the docker compose file

Full Changelog: https://github.com/shynewt/kostos/compare/v1.0.1...v1.0.2

entry.title: New release for Kostos: v1.0.3
entry.content:
v1.0.3

  • Added support for more currencies:
    • Danish Krone (DKK)
    • Swiss Franc (CHF)
    • Swedish Krona (SEK)
    • Norwegian Krone (NOK)
    • South Korean Won (KRW)
    • Mexican Peso (MXN)
    • Singapore Dollar (SGD)
    • Hong Kong Dollar (HKD)
    • New Zealand Dollar (NZD)
    • South African Rand (ZAR)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/shynewt/kostos/compare/v1.0.2...v1.0.3
